properties.description: We cater for anyone that walks through our doors! We have a free soup lunch every Monday between 12:30pm-2pm. This is available for anyone... Working from home, Who fancies soup for lunch, Who home educates, Who hasn't spoken to anyone on that day, Who needs a different environment for lunch... etc, etc.
